name: 林鈞陶
objective:
This course provides the fundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the diversity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, called multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) transmission.
Course outline:
Part 1. Fundamental Matrix Operations.
Part 2. Wireless Channels and Single-Antenna Wireless Communications.
Part 3. MIMO Wireless Communications.
